textBox.richText: Some fresh (3" overnight, snowing all day), so I brought out the s7s. I *LOVE* those skis!!!. Eagle Wind wasn't running, but the trails were open, so I did the old-school 3-lifts-to-backside-parsenn. GREAT snow back there, and no people!!! And, found another hut down near black coal. Bella was also open (but not advertised...), so I *had* to go do that. Decent coverage, but there were a few rocks under all that Pow.
